Author: starsinmyeyess
Text: My mom does the exact same thing re: trying to wear my clothes or giving me her clothes as "hand me downs". It's a shitty feeling, I'm so sorry

Author: laeyka
Text: that’s so awful i’m sorry. hopefully you realize that she is saying those comments not because she thinks they are true, but only to hurt you. hope your Christmas gets better <3 keep your head up, you got this!
